name: entire
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: whole or complete, with nothing missing
trans_examp.trans_cn: 全部的；整个的；完全的；完整的

example.eg: Between them they ate an entire cake.
example.egtrans: 他们两个吃了整整一个蛋糕。

example.eg: He'd spent the entire journey asleep.
They got an entire set of silver cutlery as a wedding present.
example.egtrans: 他们收到了一件结婚礼物，是一整套银质餐具。
